languages.text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on allies in the area regardless of distance.
languages.original_text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Стратегического{/g} плана позволяет великому стратегу использовать все {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} на союзников в этой зоне вне зависимости от дальности.

traits.locale_text: Affecting a Combat Tactics area with a stratagem grants the Strategist the ability to use all Leader's abilities on the allies in the area regardless of the distance.
Using a stratagem on a Combat Tactics area grants the Strategist the ability to use all Leader abilities on allies in the area regardless of distance.
Using a stratagem on a Combat Tactics area grants the Strategist the ability to use all Leader abilities on allies in the area regardless of distance.

languages.text: Использование {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}стратагемы{/g} на зону {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Стратегического{/g} плана позволяет великому стратегу использовать все {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицера{/g} на союзников в этой зоне вне зависимости от дальности.

traits.locale_text: Использование стратагемы на зону Стратегического плана дает стратегу способность использовать все {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} лидера на союзников в этой зоне вне зависимости от дальности.
Использование стратагемы на зону Стратегического плана дает стратегу способность использовать все {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способности{/g} лидера на союзников в этой зоне вне зависимости от дальности.

languages.text: 对任意战斗策略区域使用{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}可以对该区域内所有盟友使用全部{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，无视距离远近。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on allies in the area regardless of distance.

traits.locale_text: 对任意战斗策略区域使用{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}战略能力{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}可以对该区域内所有盟友使用全部{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，无视距离远近。

languages.text: Utilizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} en una zona creada mediante Tácticas de combate permite al {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}gran estratega{/g} usar todas las {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidades{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} sobre aliados en esa zona sin importar la distancia.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on allies in the area regardless of distance.

traits.locale_text: Utilizar una {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}estratagema{/g} en una zona creada mediante Tácticas de combate otorga al gran {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}estratega{/g} la {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de usar todas las capacidades de oficial en esa zona sin importar la distancia.

languages.text: Die Anwendung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategems{/g} auf ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet ermöglicht dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g}, auf Verbündete in dem Gebiet ungeachtet der Entfernung alle {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offiziers{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeiten{/g} anzuwenden.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on allies in the area regardless of distance.

traits.locale_text: Die Anwendung eines {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}Strategems{/g} auf ein Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiet verleiht dem {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstrategen{/g} die {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g}, ungeachtet der Entfernung auf alle Verbündeten in dem Gebiet Offiziersfähigkeiten anzuwenden.

languages.text: L'utilisation d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagème{/g} dans une zone de Tactiques de combat permet au {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}grand stratège{/g} d'utiliser toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}capacités{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}officier{/g} sur les alliés dans la zone, quelle que soit la distance.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on allies in the area regardless of distance.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisation d'un Stratagème dans une zone de Tactiques de Combat confère au Stratège la possibilité d'utiliser toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacités{/g} de Leader sur les alliés de la zone, quelle que soit la distance.

languages.text: 軍略エリアに{g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}計略{/g}を使用すると、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}はそのエリア内の味方に、距離に関係なく、すべての{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}士官{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できるようになる。
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on allies in the area regardless of distance.

traits.locale_text: 軍略エリアに計略を使用すると、戦略家はそのエリア内の味方に、距離に関係なくすべてのリーダー{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用できるようになる。

languages.text: Bir Çatışma Taktikleri alanında {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}savaş hilesi{/g} kullanmak, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Büyük Stratejist'in{/g} o alandaki dost birimler üzerinde tüm {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Subay{/g} kabiliyetlerini mesafeye bakılmaksızın kullanabilmesine olanak tanır.
languages.original_text: Using a {g|Encyclopedia:Stratagem}stratagem{/g} on a Combat Tactics area allows the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Grand Strategist{/g} to use all {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}abilities{/g} on allies in the area regardless of distance.
